title: Ethereum Real World Economy
description:
With recent advances in rollups, stablecoins, and account abstraction, Ethereum is prime for scalable real-world applications. What will it take to create a non self-referential internal economy on Ethereum and fulfill Satoshi’s vision of “A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System”?

In this panel, we'll explore the challenges and future of Real World Ethereum, focusing on moving beyond self-referential use cases to tangible, impactful applications.
